titleStmt.title: Sample A21 from The Detroit News

April 19, 1961, p 3-A "Pohl Convicted" by Allan Blanchard "Hundreds help Family" by Douglas Glazier "Wild Driver Tripped" "Showdown Is Near" "2 Yanks Executed" July 23, 1961, p. 15-A "Slave laborer tells" by William W. Lutz
